snippet: The English Premier League boasts some of the top managers in the game but to see the best players in the world you have to watch Spanish football, Barcelona president Josep Bartomeu said....

headline.main: Managers Star in Premier League, Players Shine in Spain-Bartomeu
headline.print_headline: Managers Star in Premier League, Players Shine in Spain-Bartomeu

lead_paragraph: The English Premier League boasts some of the top managers in the game but to see the best players in the world you have to watch Spanish football, Barcelona president Josep Bartomeu said.

snippet: An Asian consortium is looking to buy English Premier League club Hull for 130 million pounds ($160 million)....

headline.main: Asian Consortium Looking to Buy Premier League Team Hull
headline.print_headline: Asian Consortium Looking to Buy Premier League Team Hull

lead_paragraph: An Asian consortium is looking to buy English Premier League club Hull for 130 million pounds ($160 million).

snippet: The English Premier League has sold its television rights in China for $700 million in its biggest-ever overseas sale, a person familiar with the deal said on Thursday....

headline.main: AP Source: Premier League Sells Chinese TV Rights for $700m
headline.print_headline: AP Source: Premier League Sells Chinese TV Rights for $700m

lead_paragraph: The English Premier League has sold its television rights in China for $700 million in its biggest-ever overseas sale, a person familiar with the deal said on Thursday.

snippet: Liverpool's much-changed team was beaten 3-1 at Swansea in the English Premier League on Sunday, with Andre Ayew scoring two goals....

headline.main: Liverpool Loses 3-1 at Swansea in Premier League
headline.print_headline: Liverpool Loses 3-1 at Swansea in Premier League

lead_paragraph: Liverpool's much-changed team was beaten 3-1 at Swansea in the English Premier League on Sunday, with Andre Ayew scoring two goals.

snippet: Burnley and Middlesbrough earned crucial wins on Saturday in their push to be the two teams that clinch automatic promotion to the Premier League....

headline.main: Boost for Burnley, Boro in Premier League Push
headline.print_headline: Boost for Burnley, Boro in Premier League Push

lead_paragraph: Burnley and Middlesbrough earned crucial wins on Saturday in their push to be the two teams that clinch automatic promotion to the Premier League.

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur's Mauricio Pochettino has been named Premier League manager of the month for February, while Southampton goalkeeper Fraser Forster picked up the players' award....

lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur's Mauricio Pochettino has been named Premier League manager of the month for February, while Southampton goalkeeper Fraser Forster picked up the players' award.

snippet: Spain may have an iron grip on Europe's club competitions but the English Premier League is the dominant power when it comes to the number of players competing at Euro 2016....

headline.main: Premier League Provides Most Players at Euro 2016
headline.print_headline: Premier League Provides Most Players at Euro 2016

lead_paragraph: Spain may have an iron grip on Europe's club competitions but the English Premier League is the dominant power when it comes to the number of players competing at Euro 2016.

snippet: Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri has been named the Premier League manager of the month for March, while Tottenham Hotspur striker Harry Kane has won the players' award....

headline.main: Ranieri, Kane Pick Up Monthly Premier League Awards
headline.print_headline: Ranieri, Kane Pick Up Monthly Premier League Awards

lead_paragraph: Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri has been named the Premier League manager of the month for March, while Tottenham Hotspur striker Harry Kane has won the players' award.

snippet: The cost of watching Premier League football has fallen according to a BBC survey, which found that more than two thirds of ticket prices have been either cut or frozen this season....

headline.main: Price of Watching Premier League Falling-BBC Study
headline.print_headline: Price of Watching Premier League Falling-BBC Study

lead_paragraph: The cost of watching Premier League football has fallen according to a BBC survey, which found that more than two thirds of ticket prices have been either cut or frozen this season.
